snippet: Ehud Olmert, who resigned as prime minister of Israel in 2008 amid corruption charges, was indicted Thursday for allegedly taking bribes while he was Jerusalem’s mayor.
abstract: Ehud Olmert, who resigned as prime minister of Israel in 2008 amid corruption charges, is indicted and charged with accepting hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes to smooth the way for construction of a huge residential complex while he was the mayor of Jerusalem.
lead_paragraph: Ehud Olmert, who resigned as prime minister of Israel in 2008 amid corruption charges, was indicted Thursday for allegedly taking bribes while he was Jerusalem’s mayor.

headline.seo: Ehud Olmert, ex-Israeli Leader, Charged With Taking Bribes
headline.main: Former Israeli Premier Is Indicted on Bribery Charge
headline.print_headline: Former Israeli Premier Is Indicted on Bribery Charge
